Sara....the thyroid problem could be the base here for your issues.  The holter will be the telling tale tho.  Because you are on meds if your heart is going to throw an off beat it will do it whether or not you're on the holter or not.  The holter is a 24 hour monitor and the meds definately will change your heart function but remember there are windows within 24 hours where the meds are not as effective and that is why we take them daily to maintain.  You may not be having panic attacks as much as what you may be doing to yourself with anxiety.  I would def. stay away from ALL caffeine and see if that changes anything for you...no coffee....no colored sodas.....no chocolate,,,,,no sugar.......i am leaning towards your thyroid being the cause of this myself because they are pesky little buggers that can throw the whole system off....good luck w. the holter and let us know...
